content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.(Notice that for the same ring map, if the number of steps in the route is doubled, the distance from the starting point to the endpoint should also be doubled.)

You have been given a circular path consisting of 5 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find an albatross. Moving in a clockwise direction from the albatross, the elements on the path are a night snake, a pickup truck, a bathtub, and a rocking chair. Starting from the pickup truck, you move around the ring by 5 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?

You have been given a circular path consisting of 5 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find an albatross. Moving in a clockwise direction from the albatross, the elements on the path are a night snake, a pickup truck, a bathtub, and a rocking chair. Starting from the pickup truck, you move around the ring by 10 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?
